title: Chat Restricted

replies.body: But theres no way for you to know either way, man. Focus on things you can control. You dont control who gets punished, so dwelling on that is only going to hurt yourself. Anyways, they should have sent you a chat log with your punishment. Like a box pops up and shows you. Idk exactly.. hopefully someone else can help.
it gives you notification a thanks for your feedback a player you reported we have took action on, so you do find out.

And honestly These past few days The games have been so toxic people ragequitting, Inting, Using slurs, AFKing and just throwing games. It is almost insane.

Lol i believe that. But yeah the notification doesnt always come. I dont know why, but its notoriously unreliable. And to be honest dude, you kind of sound toxic regardless. Garbage ass jungler... take another cs im done. Sick of people talking shit but then muting me when I say something back? So they end the arguement and you get upset about that? Like, why do you want it to continue? You should be the one muting in thefirst place when they start it. Riot bans people who start it, AND retaliate. So just mute. Retaliation is literally pointless, unless you WANT to get punished.

You did nothing except flame all game.

Toxic is toxic, regardless of if you be passive-aggressive about it.
You did not see what was being said in chat. with just my log it seems like i was toxic as hell.

What was said in chat is irrelevant, this is not a grade curve where you get a free pass just because someone else was breaking records.

You cant beat stupid by hitting it with more stupid, the only answer is ignoring it and hoping it wont tilt harder.
i dont mean that what they said  justifies what i did, what most of what i said would make sense and not look toxic. Thats what i meant. Alot of it was not for troll/Flame. Thats all.
It does make sense, but repeatedly telling people they are bad is toxic regardless of how bad they are - all it does it distract and/or tilt them and create a surplus of bad.
Oh i get that much. Well thanks for the feedback.

>  I am the only ONE that got a restriction. I would take this On the Chin With no issue if the others that were Worse then me got the restriction.

You can't know that, the IFS systems notifications are highly unreliable.

> I was telling my Jungle they were bad, Because they talked crap on me yeah. I was talking trash back, But people were calling people Homophobic Slurs and Cursing up a storm That game,

Doesn't matter who started it, you are still responsible for your own behavior.

In the future I'd recommend to just mute the flamers and report them after game, instead of engaging with them.
Next time just play the game and don't type and you'll be fine.

>Where can i see the link that shows me why i was Chat banned
 
 You can see your chat logs by attempting to log in to the restricted account. It'll show up on a reform card where you can copy the links. If for some reason that's not available, you can file a ticket with Riot Support.

> I was telling my Jungle they were bad, Because they talked crap on me yeah. I was talking trash back, But people were calling people Homophobic Slurs and Cursing up a storm That game,
 
  Toxicity is still toxicity regardless of who started it. You could have just as easily muted/ignored the players if you didn't like how they were interacting with you. 

>I am the only ONE that got a restriction. I would take this On the Chin With no issue if the others that were Worse then me got the restriction.

 We have no way of knowing who does or doesn't receive punishments. As Telephone Booth and i Sona i said, the instant feedback system (IFS) is inconsistent and more often than not won't give you any kind of registered-punishment message.
